---
title: "sanity-check"
output: html_document
date: "2025-12-07"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r check image file}
df_image <- read.csv("processed_data_image.csv")

# all these statements should return TRUE
paste0("# participants: ", length(unique(df_image$random_id)))
length(unique(df_image$trial_id)) == 36
length(unique(df_image$outcome)) == 9
length(unique(df_image$utterance)) == 3
min(df_image$value) == 0
max(df_image$value) == 100
min(df_image$prob) == 0.0
max(df_image$prob) == 1.0
```

```{r check text file}
df_text <- read.csv("processed_data_text.csv")

# all these statements should return TRUE
paste0("# participants: ", length(unique(df_text$random_id)))
length(unique(df_text$trial_id)) == 36
length(unique(df_text$outcome)) == 9
length(unique(df_text$utterance)) == 3
min(df_text$value) == 0

min(df_text$prob) == 0.0
max(df_text$prob) == 1.0
```
